ariaLabel.description: Arial-label to apply to link tag.

back.description: When the link is clicked, trigger the browser back.

home.description: When the link is clicked, route to the home page.

input.description: When the link is clicked, pass data as the input object to the next Lowdefy page.  Can only be used with pageId link and newTab false.

urlQuery.description: When the link is clicked, pass data as a url query to the next page.

icon.description: Name of an React-Icon (See all icons) or properties of an Icon block for anchor icon.

pageId.description: When the link is clicked, route to the provided Lowdefy page.

href.description: The href to link to when the anchor link is clicked.

url.description: External url to link to when the anchor link is clicked.

rel.description: The relationship of the linked URL as space-separated link types.

newTab.description: Open link in a new tab when the anchor link is clicked.

replace.description: Prevent adding a new entry into browser history by replacing the url instead of pushing into history. Can only be used with pageId link and newTab false.

scroll.description: Disable scrolling to the top of the page after page transition. Can only be used with pageId link and newTab false.

style.description: Css style object to applied to anchor.

title.description: Text to display in the anchor.
